item.description: Looking for a sound to shake up your club, festival or private function? Try a little Mass-Conn Fusion - from Boston's Faneuil Hall to Hartford's First Night, from the ski slopes of Vermont to the beachfront of Nantucket, this energetic band has been keeping New England joints jumping for 20 years.. As its name suggests, Mass-Conn Fusion draws its talent from both sides of the Massachusetts-Connecticut border. The group has an extensive repertoire featuring Motown, R&B, Jazz and Blues hits of the 60's through 00's. This versatility allows the band to tailor sets for every occasion, focusing on a single style or fusing them into a lively mix that offers something for everyone. Winners of the Hartford Advocate's Grand Slam Band R&B for SEVEN years.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: PArty it up with MASS-CONN-FUSION
